sentence.Network_en: Politicians persist in imagining that "the people" warm to their cheesy slogans.
sentence.Network_cn: 政客们还在想象着“人民”对他们的空洞口号会越来越感兴趣呢。

sentence.Network_en: He is always imagining dangers that don't exist.
sentence.Network_cn: 他总是想着那些其实并不存在的危险.

sentence.Network_en: There's nobody following us — you're just imagining it!
sentence.Network_cn: 没有人跟着我们——你只不过是猜想而已.

PerfectNetExp.abs: but to say there is state involvement is not the same as imagining a monolithic apparatus planning world domination .但要说存在政府干预，与幻想一台僵硬机器谋划霸占世界不是一回事。

list.abs: 郑容和_百度百科 ... Still in Love（ 依然爱你） Imagine( 想象（imagine）） 100103正式改版为 MBC Eco House.
字典中象字的解释 ... (7) 效法[ follow the example of] (9) 想像[ imagine] (4) 象牙的省称[ ivory].
那想象力(Imagination)可就不合格了。世界上有两种人：索取者和给予者。
大学英语精读单词表(第一册) - 豆丁网 ... involve vt. (必须)包括 imagination n. 想像力 learning n. 学习；学问，知识.
英语描写人的形容词汇集_百度文库 ... hypocritical 虚伪的 imaginative 富有想象力的 impartial 公正的.

entry.def: If you imagine something, you think about it and your mind forms a picture or idea of it.

example.ex: He could not imagine a more peaceful scene...
example.tran: 他想象不出比这更祥和的景象。

example.ex: She couldn't imagine living in a place like that...
example.tran: 她无法想象住在那样一个地方。

entry.def: If you imagine that something is the case, you think that it is the case.

example.ex: I imagine you're referring to Jean-Paul Sartre...
example.tran: 我猜你说的是让－保罗·萨特。

example.ex: We tend to imagine that the Victorians were very prim and proper...
example.tran: 我们往往认为维多利亚时代的人们都一本正经,谨言慎行。

entry.def: If you imagine something, you think that you have seen, heard, or experienced that thing, although actually you have not.

example.ex: I realised that I must have imagined the whole thing.
example.tran: 我意识到大概整件事都是我臆想出来的。

auth_sentence.content: We aren't imagining things we can't see.
auth_sentence.res_content: We aren't imagining things we can't see.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We aren't imagining things we can't see.

auth_sentence.content: Being in a certain life and imagining another life.
auth_sentence.res_content: Being in a certain life and imagining another life.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Being in a certain life and imagining another life.

auth_sentence.content: She likes pretending, imagining; it expands her.
auth_sentence.res_content: She likes pretending, imagining; it expands her.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She likes pretending, imagining; it expands her.

Sentence.sentence: Every major scientific discovery began with someone imagining the world to look differently from the way others saw it.
And this is what creativity is all about -- imagining the world in a new way
